  1. Welcome to Deer Park


    News and Announcements from around the city.
View All News

  1. Mail Ballot Applications


    The City of Deer Park City Secretary’s Office will accept mail ballot applications in person during regular business hours (8AM-5PM) through the end of the business day on Thursday, April 18. Read on...

  2. National Drug Take Back Day


    National Drug Take Back day is on April 27! The Deer Park Police Department will accept and dispose of all prescription and over the counter drugs from 10AM-2PM. Drug Take Back Day will be held at the Deer Park Police Department’s parking lot... Read on...

  3. SHRED DAY


    Deer Park Citizen's Police Academy is hosting a SHRED DAY. April 27, 2019 from 10:00AM-1PM or until the truck is full. Please plan to drop off/donate unexpired canned goods or dry goods for the Interfaith Helping Hands Food Bank. Additional Info...

  4. City of Deer Park - Drinking Water Information - Updated 4-16-19


    Visit this page for current information about the City's municipal water supply, results from voluntary testing conducted following the Intercontinental Terminals Company (ITC) Deer Park fire and response, and more. Read on...
/CivicAlerts.aspx
